mapper.update: update custom_trade_flow set custom_id = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_date = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trade_snapshot = #{tradeSnapshot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event = #{event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where trade_flow_id = #{tradeFlowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select trade_flow_id, custom_id, trade_date, amount, trade_type, balance, trade_snapshot, event, remark from custom_trade_flow where trade_flow_id = #{tradeFlowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select trade_flow_id, custom_id, trade_date, amount, trade_type, balance, trade_snapshot, event, remark from custom_trade_flow
